titleStmt.title: Of the French monarchy and absolute power and also a treatise of the three states and their power, deduced from the most authentick histories for above 1200 years / this latter by Mat. Zampini de Recanati, LL.D.
titleStmt.author: Zampini, Matteo, fl. 1580.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with loss of text; second part lacking.
The second part, Zampini, A treatise of the three states ... lacking on film. It may be found, filmed and cataloged separately as Wing (2nd ed.) Z6 at reel 1982:20.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
